TopicTitle: The United Kerbal Navy Corps Log

Articles.Content:
Below is a list of all the ships, downloads for them and the pics so you can see them as a reference of what I'm doing.

Log at bottom

The U.K.N.C. Pheonix Class Exploration Frigate: The Spirit of Minmus

An Exploration Vessel Currently in the SOI of Minmus

It has 4 Probes that can act as missiles if threatened

Slow acceleration but long lasting fuel [sort of how it is in real life]

The U.K.N.C. Nero Escort Fighter

Currently in SOI of Minmus

6 Ap Missiles

The U.K.N.C. Destroyer Halibird

The Largest Ship currently in the U.K.N.C.Fleet

Currently out of service (Destroyed in Battle of Halibirds Pass)

New Version currently under construction

Has 16 Hydra Missiles

The U.K.N.C. Carrier MK2

The Largest Carrier in the Navy currently

New Carrier built and is currently in orbit around Kerbin.

2 Large docking ports for Falcon Fighters

2 Small docking ports for Wasp Fighters

2 Defence missiles

The U.K.N.C. Odin MK2

A carrier for the U.K.N.C.

Destroyed by the U.K.N.C Battleship due to critical design flaw

Has 4 small internal docking ports for probes

3 large docking ports for fighters and probes

The U.K.N.C. Vengence Class Cruiser:

Tempest

Currently being prepared for launch

63 A.P. Missiles in 7 volleys

2 guided missiles

Shoot all your problems away

U.K.N.C. Missile Frigate Vengence

Current Condition: Being Rebuilt

Has 12 Standard Missiles

Smallest Frigate in the Navy

U.K.N.C. Missile Frigate Avalon

Current Condition: Under Construction

Has 36 Standard

torpeados

The U.K.N.C. Falcon MK3

Largest fighter of U.K.N.C.

Currently out of service (remodeling)

6 AP Missiles

Atmo capability[reentry]

The U.K.N.C. Light Wasp Fighter

The smallest Fighter in the U.K.N.C. Navy

Currently in the SOI of Mun

4 standard Missiles

Ion Powered

Current Status:

After the launch of the spirit of minmus, the Kerbal Government

has begun funding our program again allowing us to build larger ships.

However, the are limiting our fleet size

Mission Log:

November 6, 2015

The Kerbal Government gave us funds to create a science and exploration ship to go to Minmus.

The U.K.N.C Pheonix Class Exploration Frigate: Spirit of Minmus was created and sent to orbit.

November 7,2015

The U.K.N.C Phoenix Class Exploration Frigate: Spirit of Kerbin was remodeled a little on the front and the Nero fighter escort was created to fit in the hanger at the back of the ship. The Nero fighter was sent to minmus to rendezvous with the ship.

November 8,2015

The U.K.N.C. Battleship MK1 was sent to orbit around Kerbin in response to threats to the peace of Kerbin.

The Battleship is meant to protect that peace

The Battleships weapons were tested for accuracy and Kerbal engineers and began fixing the problems it was having.

November 9,2015

The U.K.N.C. Carrier Mk2 was sent into orbit and is awaiting its load of fighters and fuel.

A Scan Sat was sent to minmus to search for good drilling spots.

The Kerbal Engineers finish fixing the U.K.N.C. Battle Ship.

Work on a New Frigate has begun.

November 10, 2015

The U.K.N.C. Odin and two wasp fighters were destroyed due to critical design flaw

After new update when the Battleship fires it destroys its next missiles. Our engineers are working on the issue.

However

these missiles are still good at taking down ships as seen during the destruction of the Odin

A new fighter was created the Killer Bee another variant of the wasp

Due to the New Update the U.K.N.C. Battleship MK2 had to be created to compensate for the new thermal mechanics.

November 11, 2015

The U.K.N.C.Battleship MK3 was devised after the quick failure of the MK2 version failed to accomplish what it was designed to do.

A new weapon system was devised for the Ship and ended up working. The new MK3 is being prepared for launch

The U.K.N.C. Halibird is also being redesigned to compensate for the update.

It is not scheduled for launch until November 14, 2015.

____________________________________________________________________________________________________________

The U.K.N.C. Vengence Class Cruiser: Tempest MK1 is the MK4 version of the U.K.N.C. Battleship.

November 12, 2015

The Wasp fighter currently in orbit around Mun has been sent to check out an unknown craft.

Contact has been lost with the wasp fighter.

Back at Kerbin the Missile Frigate Avalon has continued construction

(see Missile Frigate Avalon Above)

Contact has been re-established and has found the wreckage of the HDF-Missile Frigate Vengence.

Supply Ships are being prepped to salvage the frigate
Looks good, but I'd suggest NOT having this be a copy/paste of your company page, just having the mission logs and more detailed descriptions of whats going on.
